title: How safe is Uber?
description:
Uber released its first-ever safety report. How should we think about its numbers and what do they tell us about safety and sexual misconduct in the gig economy?

GUESTS:
@kateconger
@AJRavenelleNYC

LINKS: 
Uber Says 3,045 Sexual Assaults Were Reported in U.S. Rides Last Year
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/05/technology/uber-sexual-assaults-murders-deaths-safety.html
Hustle and Gig: Struggling and Surviving in the Sharing Economy
https://www.alexandreajravenelle.com/book
Uber CEO Q&A: When rape happens in an Uber, who’s responsible?
https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2019/12/06/uber-ceo-qa-when-rape-happens-an-uber-whos-responsible/

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
